title: Learning Analytics-Enabled Customized Mathematics Teaching Method Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary-level basic mathematical knowledge, experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Supporting foundational mathematics proficiency enhancement and adaptation to digital educational tools for adult learners.

learning_goals: One can explain methods for providing personalized feedback to learners by interpreting learning analytics data (logs, interaction patterns).
One can design metrics to measure learning engagement by utilizing multimodal data collected in simulation/VR environments.
One can execute a process to adjust instructional strategies by analyzing learner interaction data generated in collaborative learning scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
